title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 348.5 - Investigation Record Keeping Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 348.5 - Investigation Record Keeping Requirements

State Regulations

Investigation records shall include the following: (a) Court order for the

Investigation. (b) Supportive
documentation in the preparation of the investigation including but not limited
to: (i) Accusatory instruments, indictment, and/or petition
(ii)

Defendant/respondent statements
(iii)

Victim statements
(iv)

Arrest report(s)
(v) Related correspondence
(vi)

Release of information requests and
responses
(vii)

Related records
(viii)

Criminal history record
information
(ix)

Certificate of

Conviction
(x) any investigation
worksheet and/or notes
(c) Completed investigation report. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
348.5

Amended

New

York State Register March 27, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 13, eff. 3/27/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
